description.en: This is intended to be practical and relevant both to the centre chosen and the student.
description.et: See on mõeldud praktilise töökogemuse saamiseks ja konkreetse õppija huvidele vastavaks.

objectives.en: The aim of the module is to provide an overview of the application of formal education to clinical practice, encouraging students to return to the course with new issues to be addressed by course leaders.
objectives.et: Mooduli eesmärk on anda suurem ülevaade formaalse hariduse rakendamisest kliinilises praktikas ja julgustada üliõpilast naasma kursusele uute küsimustega, mida kursuse juhendajaga käsitleda ja lahendada.

learning_outcomes.en: At the end of this period, the student should be able to see how new academic knowledge can improve his or her ability to act as a clinical nutrition advisor.
learning_outcomes.et: Praktika läbimise järel omab üliõpilane praktilist kogemust, kuidas tema uued akadeemilised teadmised parandavad võimet kliinilise toitumisnõustajana tegutseda.

learning_outcomes.en: It is expected that the student will seek attachment to an established nutritional centre. This could be a hospital department, an engaged family practice, or a commercial concern, such as the food industry.
learning_outcomes.et: Eeldatakse, et praktika läbitakse sobivas kliinilise toitmise osakonnas.
